釼字的基本解释

釼
rì
同“釰”。

釼
rèn
同“釰”。

釼
jiàn
同“釰”。

釼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》居欠切，去梵，見。］
亦作“剣1”。亦作“劒1”。亦作“劔1”。“剑1”的繁体字。亦作“釰1”。亦作“釼1”。亦作“鐱1”。
(1)古兵器名。属短兵器。两面有刃，中间有脊，短柄。参阅《周礼·考工记·桃氏》。
(2)指剑术。
(3)用剑刺杀。
(4)指用剑割削。
(5)挟；抱。
(6)带剑；佩剑。
(7)通“斂”。《逸周书·文酌》：“一大知率謀，二大武劍勇。”朱右曾注：“劍，斂也。斂小勇以養大勇也。”一说，“劍當讀爲驗，言大武所以驗其勇也。劍、驗竝從僉聲，故得通用。”见俞樾《群经平议·周书》。
(8)地名。四川剑山的简称。
(9)地名。云南剑川的简称。

釼字的康熙字典解释
釼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
釼字的起名意思

暂无。

釼

釼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guang Yun" is not cut, go to Brahma, see. ]
Also known as "剣1". Also known as "劒1". Also known as "劔1". Traditional characters for "剑1". Also known as "釰1". Also known as "釼1". Also known as "鐱1".
(1) Names of ancient weapons. It is a short weapon. There are blades on both sides, a ridge in the middle, and a short handle. See "Zhou Li·Kao Gong Ji·Tao Shi".
(2) Refers to swordsmanship.
(3) Assassinate with a sword.
(4) Refers to cutting with a sword.
(5) Hold; hold.
(6) With sword; saber.
(7) Through "convergence". "Yi Zhou Shu·Wen Jue": "A great knowledge and tactics, two great swords and courage." Zhu Youzeng's note: "Sword, grabbing also. Capturing small courage to raise great courage." One said, "Sword should be read as Experience, Yan Dawu test his bravery. Sword and experience are combined from the sound of the same, so they are universal." See Yu Yue's "Quan Jing Ping Yi · Zhou Shu".
(8) Place name. Abbreviation for Sichuan Jianshan.
(9) Place name. Abbreviation for Jianchuan, Yunnan.
